DOC.brief_summary: We compare two POC-tests (INRario2 and CoaguChek) for the INR with the laboratory. Therefore, we take bloodsamples (capillary and venous blood) and put it on the tool. After the measuring, a number is shown = INR. We develop a Bland-Altman-plot for the correlation between the tool value and the laboratory value to illustrate the applicability in the clinical daily routine.
DOC.brief_title: Comparison of POC-test-equipment With the Laboratory
DOC.criteria: 1899 years, ICU patients Lupus erythematodes AntiPhospholipidAntik√∂rper
